Package atomica.objects

Provides all object classes of the model.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Application This class holds information of the application itself like the default game and editor settings and the language to start with.
AtomToken Represents an atom on a field.
Board Defines a game board with a certain number of rows and columns.
DefaultGameSettings Represents the default settings defining a game.
EditorGameSettings Represents the default settings for an editing game.
Field Represents a field on the game board where a token can take place on.
GameSettings Abstract class holding all necessary settings for the initialization of a game situation.
GameSituation This class holds information about a certain game situation, like the arrangement of tokens on the board.
Help Simple class holding the resource information for help files considering the language.
IndicatorToken Represents an indicator on a field.
Level Represents the level a game can be in.
Molecule This class represents molecules made up by atoms.
Token Abstract class representing a token on a field.
 

Enum Summary
Help.HelpLanguage The supported languages of the game.
 

Package atomica.objects Description

Provides all object classes of the model.
